inn1.comm: bends the ball back in straightaway and he gets well forward and plays a confident forward defensive stroke
gets the ball to curve in a little more, he gets forward and flicks it behind the keeper and down to fine leg
that's a no ball alright but that was a jaffa! The dream delivery really, it pitches on the corridor outside off and suddenly shoots up from nowhere and squares him up
goes for the flat-batted thwack but he mistimes it and the ball just beats mid-off who runs back
hits a good length outside off and he covers the line this time and defends
this one angles away from the right hander, he angles it down to third man
tries to flick this one to the on side but the ball brushes his thigh instead
Rauf gets quite a bit of outswing there and this one is directed wide outside off
gives him a bit of width outside off, he stretches out and cuts it down to point

Nazimuddin goes for broke and tries to cart him over the on side, he swings too early and gets a thick top edge, Malik runs across from cover and takes it very comfortably, Nazimuddin got away with a poor stroke in the first over but not this time
lands on a good length on offstump and he gets nicely behind it to defend
confusion there... Tamim tucks one just wide of square leg and sets off for a certain single, Ashraful sends him back but fortunately for Bangladesh the throw was only at the non-striker's end
gets forward, taps it softly to the offside and sets off for a quick run
gets forward to defend but gets a thick outside edge which rolls past third slip
tip and run... Ashraful taps it softly in front of mid-off and sets off fast, Ajmal was a little late in getting to it
gets forward and pushes it softly wide of cover and they pick up another quick single
slides on the pads this time and Ashraful comfortably flicks it down to fine leg
beats him with a brute of a delivery which pitches on offstump and moves away just a touch, the edge wasn't very far away
rocks back and punches it in the gap between cover and point to pick up a couple
he sees the width outside off and slashes hard but straight to backward point, if only he got the placement right
pitches on middle and off, he shuffles across and tucks it away wide of midwicket
pitches it a little shorter and Tamim has to get on his toes to defend that, Ashraful turns down a risky run
pitches a touch wide outside off, he plays with a high bat and pushes it to point
similar delivery, the ball angles away from the left hander and he pushes it down to mid-off with the full face of the bat
gets his front foot out and angles it wide of backward point for a run
slides on the pads and he misses out on a scoring opportunity as the ball brushes his pad and trickles to square leg
angles towards the pads and pitches on a good length, he turns it to mid-on
just a little short of a good length and he turns the face of the bat and turns it to mid-on
half volley outside off, it lands on the length for Tamim as he leans forward and drives just wide of extra cover
pitches outside off, he gets forward and taps it wide of cover for a single
tries to drive to the on side but mistimes the drive
slides on the pads and Ashraful tucks it away on the up and just manages to clear square leg
Ashraful shoulders arms to a delivery which hits a good length outside off and holds its line, there was good carry too
similar delivery, just a touch wider and the same result as Ashraful shoulders arms
this one nips back in from outside off and Ashraful just manages to fend it away
risky stuff from Ashraful as he appears to shoulder arms and the ball catches the outside edge and just beats slip
turns the face of the bat as the ball drifts towards middle stump and works it wide of square leg
gets a half stride forward and taps it in front of gully, Rauf getting a bit of extra bounce there
Tamim shapes to play a spanking square drive but Misbah at short cover intercepts it, Tamim looks in good rhythm here
pitches outside off and holds its line before reaching the keeper
Tamim finds the gap this time, gets a lot of width to work with outside off and he drives square of the wicket on the offside on the front foot, beats backward point
good comeback by Tanvir as he gets a bit of late movement and beats Tamim on the forward prod
comes into the batsman this time and he covers the line well and defends
fullish and little wide outside off, he leans forward for the drive and gets a thick outside edge which rolls to third man
pitches on a good length on middle and straightens, he defends off the full face of the bat
turns his bat just slightly to whip it to the on side but he ends up playing straight to mid-on
lovely shot there, pitches outside off and the bounce is good enough for Tamim as he stands erect and cuts wide of backward point, the placement was good and the balance even better
shows respect to the bowler by defending, that wasn't a boundary ball anyway
gets a touch forward and pushes a good length delivery to mid-off
slides towards his body this time, he hops and flicks it down to fine leg
beaten! Pitches on the corridor outside off and gets it to come back in late and beat Tamim on the forward prod
misdirects it on the pads and he nudges it off his pads and beats the keeper and short fine leg, Tanvir couldnt control the movement on that occasion
attempts another neat square drive but he ends up chopping it wide of cover
angles it towards the pads and he nudges it down to midwicket
angles across the right hander and lands on a fullish length, he gets forward and taps it to cover
fires in the bouncer down the legside, he swivels to hook but misses it completely
hits a good length on the offstump, he hops to cover the extra bounce and defends
hits the deck hard again and Tamim once again gets on his toes, this time he pushes it towards cover
slightly fuller in length but he strays on the pads, he shuffles and tucks it wide of square leg
tempts him with width outside off and Ashraful goes for a wild slash and misses, running out of patience here
That was worth it! The ball was just marginally short and Ashraful spotted it early, got on top of the bounce and pulled it effortlessly over deep midwicket, the ball boy drops it though

Six and out... After playing the best shot of the match Ashraful's stint ends, the extra bounce from Rauf directed at his body has him at sea, he tries to fend it off but the ball lobs up and Misbah takes the easiest of catches at point
swinging in towards the pads, he tucks it wide of mid-on
Tanvir bangs it in the bouncer and Raqibul falls for the bait, his hook fails to get the distance and Iftikhar Anjum runs forward from fine leg and takes the sitter
hits a good length outside off and he gets forward and defends
just a touch wide outside off and he gets forward and angles it down to third man
shuffles across his stumps and tucks it in front of mid-on
hits a goo length on middle and holds its line, he gets back and across and defends well

That's a ripper! Rauf hits the deck hard and the extra bounce gets him another scalp, Tamim has no time to fend off that delivery, he takes his eyes off the ball and the ball lobs off his glove and gives Younis an easy catch at first slip
bangs it in short of a length outside off but Kapali does well to defend
Rauf nearly cleans him up there, Kapali fails to make contact off the full face of the bat as the ball cuts back in from outside off, he plays an inside out shot to the offside
beats him with a jaffa now, it lands on the corridor outside off and moves away just a touch, the swing and seam is getting rather difficult to counter here
bangs it in short, it kicks up on Kapali as he takes a blow on the shoulder
beats him outside the offstump to round off a superb over, Kapali attempts a drive through mid-off but misses
comes round the wicket, Rahim gets forward and defends
he gets across and taps it wide of point and sets off, Butt has a shy at the stumps at the bowler's end as they take a risky run
angles into the right hander and squares him up, Kapali looks a bit nervous there as
fires in the yorker length and Kapali does well to get his bat down on time to dig it out
fullish outside off, he drives on the up and nearly gives a low return catch to Tanvir
risky, but he'll take it, Tanvit bangs it in short, Kapali makes room and attempts an upper cut but the ball gets a thoick top edge and runs towards the fine leg boundary
hits a good length on off, he shuffles and defends back to the bowler
pushed back to the bowler
hits a good length outside off, he gets across his stumps and fends it off towards point
bangs it in short this time but directs it wide down the legside, Rahim thinks of playing at it but changes his mind
fullish outside the offstump, he gets forward and taps it to mid-off
pitches outside off and Rauf gets good carry to the keeper as Rahim shoulders arms
fullish on the pads and Rahim shapes to drive and checks his stroke and nearly lobs back a return catch
hits a good length outside off and he gets behind the line and defends
How did that miss? Anjum gets one to cut back in sharply, Kapali doesn't move his feet, closes the face of the bat and a thick inside edge narrowly misses the stumps and rolls to fine leg
gets behind the line this time and defends to mid-off
Anjum maintains his line very close to the batsman, he pushes to mid-on
bangs in a bouncer and directs it wide down the legside, he attempts a hook but misses
slides down the legside and Kapali closes the face of the bat and easily nudges it down to fine leg
Kapali goes one better as he gets behind the line to a full delivery on middle and leg and pushes it past the bowler and mid-on
gets a bit of turn straight away, he tucks it to the on side
gets turn again, he shuffles and tucks it to midwicket
fires it fuller, he shuffles and turns it to square leg
slides wide down the legside, Sarfraz tries to whip the bails off but the batsman was always in
slides on the pads again, he turns it to the on side
tucks it down to square leg and Malik runs back and effects a sliding save, there's plenty of confusion in the running as Rahim is sent back, Malik's throw is at the striker's end
floated on middle and leg, he defends
fullish on off and middle, he gets behind the line and pushes to mid-off
hits a good length outside off and shapes away just a touch, he watchfully shoulders arms
this one bounces a touch more but Rahim gets his elbows high and punches it towards mid-off
similar delivery, the angle takes it wider outside off and Rahim gets his elbows high again and punches it towards cover
gets a touch forward and pushes it towards mid-off on the walk
fullish outside off, he gets forward and pushes it down to extra cover
big confusion in the running, he tucks it towards square leg and Kapali wanted the run, Rahim wasn't interested
beats him fair and square with the doosra, beware of Ajmal
floated on the pads, he turns it towards midwicket

Appeal: He tries to chop it wide of point and there was a sound before Sarfraz took the catch, he seemed confident but the umpire reckoned the bat hit the pad, fair enough, I didn't see an edge either
swept to Misbah at short fine leg
Pitches outside the offstump at a good pace and the extra bounce claims Kapali, he tries to defend but opens the face of the bat and Younis takes it at first slip falling backwards
bangs in the bouncer and he ducks under it
hits a good length outside off and Mahmudullah is solid in defence
full on middle and off, that was in the length to drive but he half-heartedly pushes it to mid-on
another fullish delivery on middle and off and he again softly taps it to the on side
pitches outside off and holds its line, he opts to shoulder arms
slides down the legside, wide called
Chance! He gets forward and a thick outside edge just beats Younis at slip
floated on the pads, he turns it to short fine leg
floated on middle and leg, he turns it to the on side
beats him with the doosra, Ajmal's mixing them up well here
fires it fuller and flatter, he pushes it back to the bowler
pushed back to the bowler
fires in the bouncer, that was way too high for Rahim and wide called
pitches on off and middle, he gets across and tucks it to midwicket
opens the face of the bat and taps it towards cover, Rahim yells and turns down the single
directs this one on the body and he works it towards midwicket
full outside off and he plays a solid forward defensive stroke
fullish outside off and he defends
closes the face of the bat as the ball drifts in towards him and he tucks it to square leg
takes a few paces down the track and turns it towards square leg
flighted on middle and off, he turns it towards midwicket
a little slower through the air this time, the ball appears to brush the pads but Sarfraz appeals for a caught behind
defended to the offside
stays back at the crease and taps it back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he gets forward and taps it towards point
pitches it just short of a length on middle, he rocks back and defends to the on side
pitches outside off, he opens the face of the bat and dabs it to third man
gets forward and defends to the on side
gets a half stride forward and the extra bounce just catches him by surprise and strikes his glove, he;s in a bit of pain
opens the face of the bat to a delivery that shapes away and steers it to third man
Rahim gets back and across and plays a solid defensive stroke back to the bowler
defends on the backfoot very close to the pads, the ball was sliding down leg, Sarfraz appeals for a leg before
fires it down the legside, wide called
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends
gets his front foot forward and pushes it wide of mid-on
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends
takes a few paces down the track but checks his stroke and defends, it was a wise decision by Rahim because the ball straightened
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends
fires in the bouncer and the ball sails over his arched back
that was an action replay, another bouncer and Mahmudullah plays it safe by ducking
varies his length by firing in the yorker, he pushes it towards mid-on and sets off for a run, Rahim sends him back but the throw from Misbah hits Rahim's end, Mahmudullah was miles out of his crease
back of a length, he defends to the on side
pitches outside off and the late movement just beats the batsman as he hangs his bat out, very close to the edge
and again, Anjum could have had two in two, beats him with another beauty which just shapes away
comes round the wicket, he rocks back and defends to the on side
breaks the shackles with a boundary, he gives him the charge and forces it past the diving Ajmal and mid-on
the doosra and Rahim was clueless, the combination of turn and alarming bounce squares him up
the ball lobs off the pads and rolls to the on side
flighted on the pads, he plays it down to square leg
hits a good length on off and middle, he rocks back and defends
cuts back on the pace a little and gets it to shape away, he tries to punch it through the offside but he's beaten
gets behind the line this time and punches it towards cover, Anjum gets it to shape away again
Mahmudullah loses a bit of patience as he makes room to punch it through the offside, the bat was nowhere near the ball on that occasion
bangs in the bouncer this time, he ducks under it
hits a good length on off and middle and he shuffles across and defends, that ends a maiden over for Anjum
strays down leg, he tucks it past legslip
cuts back on the pace and pitches it a little short to get some turn, he shuffles and whips it wide of midwicket
shoulders arms outside the offstump

Rahim rocks back and tucks it towards Jamshed at short midwicket and sets off, Jamshed dives to his left and fires in the throw at the striker's end, Rahim was ball-watching all along and turned around and tried desperately to make his ground but Sarfraz had whipped off the bails
flighted on the pads, the ball lobs off his pads towards legslip
Reza works it down to midwicket
defended on the backfoot to the offside
gets the ball to shape inwards and he shuffles across and clips it on the up past the vacant square leg region
this one comes into the right hander and he closes the face of the bat and works it to midwicket
drives off the full face of the bat but can't beat Malik at mid-off who runs across to cut it off
fullish outside off, Reza half heartedly pokes at it
shuffles across to whip it to the on side and the ball goes on the bounce to Misbah at legslip
gets across and turns it to deep backward square-leg for a single
gets forward and defends on the front foot
gets his front foot across and gets a thin inside edge onto his pads, it falls well short of the region of forward short leg
flighted outside off, he drives to the offside
gets across and turns it to fine leg
Anjum's miserly spell continues as he beats Reza with one that swings and seams away
bowls the same stump to stump line and doesn't give him any width, he opens the face of the bat and steers it towards point
back of a length, he defends to the offside
another play and a miss, Anjum probes away again and this time he gets the ball to bend back in
pitches it up a little fuller and gets it to shape away from the right hander, Reza continues to play and miss
holds the length back and doesn't give him any width, he stays back and defends, that ends yet another maiden over
flighted on middle ,he pushes it to long-on
pitches outside off and he taps it to the offside
Mahmudullah's struggle ends, Malik floats it down the leg side, he tries to whip it behind square on the on side but ends up playing it straight to Misbah at legslip who takes a sharp catch
gets it to drift in nicely through the air, he gets his front foot across and defends
tosses it up slowly outside the offstump, he rocks back and cuts towards point to bring up the 100
pushes it towards square leg

Anjum gets another reward for his miserly spell! He pitches it on a good length on offstump and gets it to cut back in, Mashrafe stays rooted to the crease and is struck in line with middle stump, easy decision for Ian Gould
greets him with a real snorter, it pitches on middle and suddenly shoots up and fizzes past Razzak's nose
lands outside off and shapes away, Razzak pokes his bat out
shapes away from the left hander, he pokes his bat out to defend but then shoulders arms
beats him again with the away movement, Razzak shoulders arms at the last minute
and a maiden it is, Razzak frees his arms and tries to lash at one that slants away from him
stretches forward to drive but he misses
slides down the legside
flighted on middle and leg, he works it wide of midwicket
flighted on off and middle, he gets forward and defends
gives it a lot of air and tempts him to drive, the extra bounce beats him
flighted outside off, he gets forward and pushes to backward point
shuffles at his crease and tucks it away to midwicket
comes round the wicket, he floats it non middle and leg and he tucks it behind square on the on side
flights it very slowly on off and middle, he defends
it's that dreaded doosra again, turn and bounce to beat him and Sarfraz shows good reflexes to glove that
flights it wide down the legside
gets well forward to a full delivery and smothers the turn
gets well forward and defends again
defended back to the bowler
smashed! Flighted very slowly outside off, Razzak stays at the crease and gets enough distance as he slogs it over wide long-on
gets forward and scoops it down towards the region of mid-off
turned to square leg
gets forward to defend but the ball clips his pad
flighted on middle and leg, he turns it to Misbah at legslip
once again he tucks it to the on side but can't beat Misbah
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
loses his control and slides well down the legside
short and wide, not much turn, he shapes to slam it square of the wicket but meets this air
flighted on off and middle, he defends on the front foot
Ajmal switches back to over the wicket and traps him, he dishes out another doosra, Razzak tries to slog it over the on side but swings way too early and the ball crashes onto the stumps
fires it in fuller, he gets forward and defends
teases him with another doosra, but this is fairly wide outside off
gets it to swing inwards to catch the batsman on the pads, he appeals for a legbefore but the ball was sliding down the legside
squares him up with a short one but he manages to swivels and nudge it behind square on the on side
attempts a yorker but it turns into a low full toss, he pushes it down to mid-on
loses his line and slides way down the legside
hits the deck hard and beats him outside the offstump, Shahadat probably lost it in the gloom
fires it short again but this time Shahadat gets behind the line and defends
bowls it fuller in length and Shahadat gets forward and pushes it down to mid-on
flighted outside off, he gets well forward and defends

...and it's a doosra to wrap up the innings. He gives it a lot of flight and that prompts Reza to give him the charge, he misreads the turn and misses it completely and it's an easy stumping for Sarfraz

inn2.comm: starts off with a loosener outside off, it slides wide outside off and he shoulders arms
adjusts the line closer to the batsman, Butt weaves away from it
slides on the pads and he tucks it away neatly wide of square leg
hits a good length on middle and leg, he stays forward and pushes it to mid-on
fullish outside off and curving away, he gets well forward and defends to the offside
maintains a good line and length by cramping the batsman for room, he gets forward and defends back to the bowler
good line and length again, doesn't give him any width outside off and Butt respects that by watchfully shouldering arms
hits a fullish length outside off and comes back in, he gets behind the line and pushes it to the offside
strays a touch too side outside off and lands it on a fullish length as well, he reaches out and steers it to third man
pitches on the same fullish length outside off but the line is closer to the batsman, he shoulders arms
grunts as he delivers the ball, it's slightly short but he gets on top of the bounce and defends back to the bowler
angles that across the left hander, he shoulders arms
directs it at his body this time and he shuffles and tucks it down to deep square leg
bowls it full and straight on the offstump, he half heartedly pushes that past the bowler
sudden rush of blood by Jamshed as he gives him the charge and misses it completely, the late away movement saved him
shuffles across his stumps and tucks it to midwicket
bowls the slower ball and lands it on a full length outside off, he gets a thick outside edge to third man
bangs in the bouncer and he drops his shoulder to take evasive action, umpire Tony Hill signals the one bouncer for the over
hits a good length outside off, he shoulders arms
cracker! Shahadat bangs it in short and Jamshed picks the length early, gets on top of the bounce and clubs it over deep midwicket, that went some distance over the rope
pitches outside off and slants away, he opens the face of the bat and steers it towards point
gets forward to a full delivery outside off and pushes it to point
slides towards the pads and he shuffles across the stumps and milks it down to fine leg
lands outside off, it was in the length to drive but he places it straight to mid-off
bangs it in short of a length and once again it sits up nicely for Jamshed who swivels and pulls it over midwicket
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends
pitches on a good length on off, he stays back and clips it back to the bowler
gets a touch forward and pushes it back to the bowler
shuffles across, turns his wrists and pushes it towards mid-on
flighted outside off, he pushes it back to the bowler
Butt ruins a potential maiden as he makes a bit of room and cuts a short and wide delivery square of the wicket of the wicket on the offside
nearly claims a wicket in the first ball after the break, it jags back in really sharply, tucks him up and nearly trickles back onto the stumps after fending it
grunts as he delivers, Jamshed gets behind it this time and defends
a cracker of a delivery there, it kicks after pitching and beats the batsman fair and square, Rahim fails to glove it cleanly as the ball lobs up
this is hostile stuff, Butt ducks to evade a bouncer but the ball brushes his helmet and races away towards fine leg
hits a good length outside off, he gets behind the line and defends
fullish outside off, he drives it straight to short cover off the meat of the bat
slides on the pads and he works it away past mid-on for a single
hits a good length outside off and he pushes it towards mid-off
gets behind the line to a good length delivery and taps it back to the bowler
Butt's cramped for room as he shapes to cut and as a result gets a thick edge onto his pads
he errs by overpitching outside the offstump and Butt gets nicely behind the line and plays a crisp off drive past mid-off
holds the length back a little and he softly taps it down to mid-off
fractionally short of a length, Jamshed looks in imperious touch as he gets on top of it early and clubs it over mid-on, that traveled in a flash
he goes for an ambitious off drive but fails to counter the bounce, the away movement tucks him up
Shahadat brings the length closer to the left hander and he gets behind the line and defends
Jamshed clips it on the up towards square leg and Razzak fumbles, that allows for the run
he grunts again at the time of delivery, he gets back and defends
another grunt, this time he puts in more effort and dishes out a bouncer, Butt swivels to hook but misses
beats him straightaway, he gets forward and the turn sneaks past the edge
he overpitches outrside the offstump and he leans forward and drives on the up in the arc between cover and mid-off
gets back and defends
strays wide down the legside, he shapes to glance it down to fine leg
fullish outside off, he leans forward and drives through the line, cover runs back and cuts it off
gets on the backfoot and defends
goes back and across and clips it in front of midwicket and sets off for a risky run, Raqibul fires the throw to the striker's end but it's a little too late
pitches on middle and off, he shuffles just a touch and uses his wrists well to find the gap past midwicket with precision, he middles it and the outfield does the rest
he follows it up with a false stroke, he flashes at a wide delivery without moving his feet
gets across his stumps a touch and defends back to the bowler
good delivery by Shahadat as he cramps him for room, he uses his feet well to get behind the line and defend
fullish outside off, he gets forward and pushes towards mid-off
fullish outside off, he just manages to beat the gap between mid-off and cover
gets quite a bit of turn, he gets forward and defends to the on side
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
waits for the turn and nudges it through the line towards square leg
stays back at the crease, waits for the turn and clips it wide of midwicket
clips it wide of midwicket for a quick single, Rahim hurries the fielder to fire in the throw quickly but the batsmen were safe
stays back, picks the turn and clips it behind square on the on side
full and wide outside off, he pushes it through the line to mid-off
pitches on off and middle, cramps him for room but Butt pushes it comfortably to cover
another grunt but this time he misdirects it on the half volley outside off and Butt gives it the treatment by crashing it past extra cover
responds with a bouncer, it sails over his arched back
pitches it short again and he swivels and pulls to deep backward square leg
bangs in a bouncer and Jamshed shapes to hook but drops his shot, the ball was a little too quick for him
hits a good length outside off and he cuts towards point
gets well forward to drive but the ball straightens and beats him
shuffles across and tucks it with the turn wide of square leg
he continues from over the wicket, he tucks it away with the turn behind square on the on side
flighted outside off, he leans forward and drives to cover
flighted outside off, he pushes it back to the bowler
stays back and pushes it through the line to the on side
full and slightly wide outside off, he drives to mid-off
another full delivery outside off, he drives it to short cover
bangs it in short, he gets in position to hook but checks his stroke, the ball lands safely in front of deep midwicket
overthrows!  He taps it down to backward point and the fielder at backward point had a shy at the stumps at the non striker's end, nobody to back the throw though
classic! That was just fractionally wide outside off, Butt gets across and times it crisply past cover and backward point
fires in the yorker outside off and Butt fails to dig it out
full outside off, he drives towards cover
pushed to the on side
sees the width and shapes to cut but the ball straightens and beats him
tucked towards midwicket, Rahim hurries the fielder to fire it to him but the batsmen make it safely
defends on the front foot back to the bowler
tries to play it it to the on side but gets a leading edge to the offside
comes round the wicket, he shuffles and whips it against the turn to the on side
flighted on middle and leg, he pushes it back to the bowler
flighted outside off, defended back to the bowler
fires it on the pads, he pushes it to mid-on
full outside off, he pushes it through the line to long-off
bowls a low full toss close to the pads, he tucks it away to the on side and just beats midwicket
straightens after pitching, he shapes to cut but is beaten for pace
gets back and across and clips it wide of mid-on
flighted outside off, Butt plays a neat front foot defense
slides on the pads, he gets on his knee and sweeps to deep square leg, Shahadat does well to slide and mop it up
he works it to midwicket
bowls it a touch too wide outside off, the ball straightens again but Butt makes room and adjusts well to spank it past extra cover
Effortless! Flighted on off and middle, Jamshed stays at the crease, waits for the ball to come onto him and meely lofts through the line and clears wide long-on
defended to the offside
he's beaten on the drive and Rahim vociferously appeals for a catch, he had no supprt though
full outside off and he scoops it over extra cover for a couple
he picks it from wide outside the offstump and controls the sweep well to beat midwicket, he brings up his fifty with that shot
Butt gets into the act this time, he slog sweeps with the turn and the ball is airborne for a while but well clear of any fielder
and again, he flights it on middle and he slogs it square this time, enough to fetch another boundary
stays back and pushes this one to long-on

floated on the pads this time and he sweeps and places it fine this time, the ball races along the turf and Butt brings up his half-century, Bangladesh must be sick and tired of him. He scored 450 odd runs against them in the five-match series in April
slightly wide outside off, he cuts towards point and a fumble results in a couple
Reza bangs in a bouncer and Jamshed is beaten for pace on the hook, the umpire signals one bouncer for the over
hits a good length outside off and he pushes it to the offside
stretches forward to drive and gets a thick inside edge which misses the stumps
Butt finishes it off in style, there was width outside off and he got across and smashed it square of the wicket on the offside, it raced along the turf to the boundary
